meanings.definition: To spread or promote (an idea or theory) widely.
meanings.sent1: She was propagating the importance of recycling in her community.
meanings.sent2: The company was propagating their new product through social media.
meanings.sent3: He kept propagating the idea of having a pizza party every day!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for gardening was propagating like wildfire among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The rumor about the new student was propagating faster than anyone expected.

meanings.definition: To reproduce or multiply (plants or animals) by natural processes.
meanings.sent1: The plant was propagating new shoots in the spring.
meanings.sent2: The rabbits were propagating quickly in the field.
meanings.sent3: The flowers seemed to be propagating themselves overnight!
meanings.sent4: The idea of teamwork was propagating among the ants in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The virus was propagating through the population at an alarming rate.
